text: Daniele Santini (born 3 November 1992) is an Italian sprint canoeist. He participated at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.C-4 500 m results ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Italian male canoeists Category:Living people Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in Canadian Category:European Games competitors for Italy Category:Canoeists at the 2019 European Games
title: Daniele Santini
